title: Robert Bly - Iron John
description:
Audiobook of the Best Seller -- 
Abridged version, read by the Author. 64kbps.

Bly is a great poet who was an early pioneer in the modern
mythopoetic men\\\\\\\&#039;s movement.  I saw a video of Bly called
\\\\\\\"A Gathering of men\\\\\\\" in 1991 and that primed me for my
own work on the mature masculine.

This Book is about deep Male Identity, the growth from 
boy to man, and how the maturation of men relies on other 
men more than the approval of women.  Rather than some old 
form of abusive patriarchy, we now grow to a place where 
men claim their rightful masculine heritage which is 
ultimately aligned with the goddess power within women.

If you wish to investigate more into men\\\\\\\&#039;s work and
perhaps even attend an experiencial workshop,
contact me.  poyball at yahoo dot com.
